title: Add mute timings to notification policy

blocks.content: After creating time intervals, you apply them to notification policies as mute timings. You can add multiple mute timings to a single notification policy for comprehensive coverage.
Navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Notification configuration**.
Locate the notification policy you want to edit. For the Default Policy, click **Edit** to open the policy editor.

Scroll to the **Mute timings** section and select the time intervals you created from the dropdown:

1. Select `Sunday maintenance window`
2. Select `Non-business hours`

Verify that both mute timings are listed.
Click **Update default policy** (or **Save policy**) to apply the changes.

The notification policy now has mute timings configured. Notifications will be suppressed during:

- **Sunday maintenance window** (Sundays 2:00 AM â€“ 4:00 AM)
- **Non-business hours** (weekday nights and weekends)
